fields.description: A company or other legal business entity
fields.name: Organisation

fields.description: A formalised group that works together on a project or task
fields.name: Working Group

fields.description: A group exported from an Active Directory instance
fields.name: Active Directory Group

fields.description: A small group of people who work together as part of a traditional organisational structure, typically containing a Team leader.
fields.name: Team

fields.description: A group of related Teams who work together as part of a traditional organisational structure.
fields.name: Department

fields.description: A group of related Deparements who work together as part of a traditional organisational structure.
fields.name: Division
